com.datumbox.common.persistentstorage.interfaces

Interface DatabaseConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryConfiguration, MapDBConfiguration

    public interface DatabaseConfiguration
    This interface should be implemented by objects that store the configuration of DB connectors.
    Author:
    Vasilis Vryniotis

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DatabaseConnector getConnector(String database)
      Initializes and returns a connection to the Database.
      String getDBnameSeparator()
      Returns the separator that is used in the DB names.
      void load(Properties properties)
      Initializes the DatabaseConfiguration object by using a property file.

    • Method Detail

      • getDBnameSeparator

        String getDBnameSeparator()
        Returns the separator that is used in the DB names. Usually the database names used by the algorithms are concatenations of various words separated by this character.
        Returns:

        DatabaseConnector getConnector(String database)
        Initializes and returns a connection to the Database.

        Initializes the DatabaseConfiguration object by using a property file.
